text: brrda hying khxng phwk cea nan khux hælng pheaa pluk khxng phwk cea dangnan phwk cea cng mayang hælng pheaa pluk khxng phwk cea tam tæ phwk cea prasngkh læa cng prakxb lwnghna wi sahrab taw khxng phwk cea læa phung ya ke rng xallxhˌ theid læa phung ru dwywa thæcring phwk cea nan ca pen phu phb kab phraxngkh læa cea cng cæng khawdi kæ brrda phu sraththa thanghlay theid
